mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VL_EMS_VOD_HIST ( ems_id, camera_type, camera_id, video_file ) VALUES ( #{ems_id}, #{camera_type}, #{camera_id}, #{video_file} )
INSERT INTO VL_EMS_VA_HIST ( ems_id, code, value, url, thumbnail, date ) VALUES ( #{ems_id}, #{code}, #{value}, #{url}, #{thumbnail}, to_timestamp(#{dateTime}, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') )
